name: A Dark Place (Scayze)
description:
A Dark Place is a Platformer set in Hell. Rush though different Levels, avoiding Spikes and enemies,  or try to beat high scores in Arcade Mode!

Controls:

Playable by keyboard and controller!

Instruction on how to control the player are in-game aswell.


Keyboard:Controller (360):MoveA and D
Joystick or D-Pad
JumpSpaceAStompSX
